answers.answer: 36 weeks is a little late but it is true most ftms go to 40 or later.try to look at it on the flip side... at least they're throwing one at all.

I know I'm just irritated cause I can't buy anything yet cause of the shower. And I'm stressing out cause I feel like that's not enough time to even do anything and I'm gonna be so big I'm gonna be miserable the whole time. And the only reason they're doing it so late is cause my sister has stuff planned all throughout July and she won't be able to go unless its in august. So its basically all about her.
My first baby I had at 36 weeks... I would ask them to do it earlier :) if your sis can't make it that's to bad, but this iis about you.
My baby shower is this weekend I'll be 37.4 weeks on the day of
Ill be 38 at my second one. I think it'll be fine. Just relax and enjoy it at your party so youll be comfortable(:
Im 38 weeks and my baby shower is this saturday even if the baby is to come earlier u can always do a welcoming :) dnt worry and enjoy
I had my first baby a few days before I hit 38 weeks

I had my first baby at 33 weeks, in fact they had to let me out of the hospital to attend my baby shower for the day! I had been hospitalised from 30 weeks for preeclampsia. My last pregnancy I had a shower at 34 weeks, and gave birth at 39 weeks. It's hard to predict if anything could happen, I think having a baby shower before 35 weeks is a good idea, and if baby comes early, you can still have it as planned, it'll just be 'meet n greet' instead!
I had my daughter at 39weeks and 5days.I had my baby shower when i was 37weeks ,my husband and I drove back home from NC to Tx. I've seen women have their baby showers at 38weeks so your good.
I had my first baby at 37 weeks so that's not true. I wouldn't wait too late to have a baby shower because ur probably gonna be fatigued! :-):-):-)

That's too late for a shower unless they are all going to help you put the babies things together and drive you around to shop for everything.   My friend had her shower at 36 weeks and gave birth a week later.  The good thing is lots of people send the gifts in advance now.  Do your registry now and send the invites early with that info.   I had mine this past weekend at 31 weeks.

Wow sounds kinda like my situation...I'm 36+2 my mom is having my "double baby shower" on June 21st&&I'm due July 1st don't think I'm gonna last that long but yeah this is my first baby her first grandchild&&she's throwing a double baby shower for me&&my cousin who I don't even talk to?!?!?!? I'm hurt pissed off all the above I can relate to yuhh&&she's not due till late July early August fkkn ***** but I have no say so Anywayz be strong girl I'm hoping for a welcome baby shower lol congrats goodluck
Im having my baby shower at 36 weeks and 4 days and its this Saturday
Im 38 weeks today and they threw my shower may 17.

I had my son at 36  weeks and my sistet was still pannin my shower...didnt get one with him but i helped her plan one for my daughter...had it in april and im not due til july. Just remember its about you and the baby NOT the rest of your family. If you wanna do it earlier then say something...your suster can do something special just the 2 of you later if she wants.
I had my son at 40+4 weeks and I had that shower around 34 weeks and I am 33+5 weeks and I had my shower yesterday I think everything will be fine but if you want your shower early say something
I had my first 3 weeks before her due date.
With my first my water broke and I delivered her at 38 weeks.

38.3wks I had my first and I will have my baby shower this time almost at 34 wks!  I don't think its to late for u I just know it will be hard to wait that long to get the things u need and don't get as gifts! Which will happen but one trip to babies r us or wherever ur going to buy ur stuff after ur shower and u will be ok!
Having my shower this Sunday I will be 31 weeks
My baby shower for my first pregnancy was scheduled for 38+5, and he was born 38+3.  Ended up coming home to the baby shower.  Sooner is better, so you can be less stressed and more prepared.

question: My family is doing my baby shower August 2 when I'm 36 weeks. I'm so mad cause im stressed out and I feel like that's way too late. they're saying its my first baby and I'll probably go past 40 weeks. My question is when did you ladies give birth with your first baby? And is it just me or is 36 weeks a late baby shower?
title: What week did you give birth?
